description: Erection of single-storey rear and first floor rear extensions, hip to gable and rear dormer roof extension with installation of 2no frotn rooflights to faciliitate loft conversion. Associated changes to fenestration
decision_conditions: The proposed extension by virtue of its size, siting and design would diminish the character and appearance of the existing dwelling and would appear visually intrusive and overly dominant within the street scene further unbalancing a pair of semi detached dwelling resulting in unacceptable harm to the character and appearance of the dwelling and wider area, contrary to Policy D3 of the London Plan 2021 and policies CS8 and DM10 of the Council's adopted LDF Core Strategy April 2012

The applicant has failed to demonstrate through the submission of cogent information that the proposed development would not result in noise and disturbance with the introduction of a large air condition unit, contrary to Policy D3 of the London Plan 2021 and policies CS8 and DM10 of the Council's adopted LDF Core Strategy April 2012

It has not been demonstrated through the submission of a Fire Statement that the proposed development would achieve the highest standards of fire safety, contrary to Policy D12 of the London Plan (2021).
